articles.author: Sumitra Debroy
articles.title: 61% of Mumbai’s 2021 excess deaths attributed to Covid
articles.description: India News: Mumbai recorded 16,890 excess deaths in 2021, of which about 10,289 or 61% have been certified as Covid deaths.

articles.author: Shailvee Sharda
articles.title: ‘Present Covid surge a ripple, not a wave’
articles.description: He said the present surge should not even be called a wave. “It is better to call the recent rise as a ripple rather than a wave. Also, eventually, coronavirus will become a common flu,” he said.

articles.title: Covaxin safe for 2-18 age group: BB study
articles.description: It conducted phase II/III, open-label, and multicentre study to evaluate the safety, reactogenicity and immunogenicity of Covaxin in children and adolescents in the 2-18 years of age group between June- September 2021, Bharat Biotech said in a statement.

articles.title: Dealer of used high-end cars held for duping buyers of ₹1.5cr paid as advance
